title: Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi | Biography & Facts – UAE Human Journey

quotes: In February 2006, He was appointed as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial Development Council by HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum.
On September 10, 2006, he was appointed as Head of the Executive Office by HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum.
On November 13, 2007, he was appointed as Deputy Chairman of the Emirates Investment Authority by HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum.
On May 20, 2008, he held the position of Co-Chair of the Global Agenda Councils established in collaboration between the UAE government and the World Economic Forum.
On September 11, 2012, he was appointed as Chairman of the World Government Summit (WGS) by HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum.

On August 8, 2015, he was appointed by HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum as Vice Chairman of the Board of Trustees and Managing Director of Dubai Future Museum Foundation, later known as Dubai Future Foundation.
On December 27, 2015, he was appointed by HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum to the role of Secretary General of The Mohammed Bin Rashid Global Initiatives (MBRGI).
On February 10, 2016, HH Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, approved the new UAE Cabinet, upon which the Future portfolio was added to his ministerial functions.
On July 12, 2018, he was selected as member of the High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation by the United Nations Secretary-General.
On May 25, 2019, he held the position of the Chairman of the Arab League’s Board of Trustees of the Arab Government Excellence Award.
On July 5, 2020, HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum announced the new UAE Cabinet and he was appointed as Minister of Cabinet Affairs.
On January 4, 2022, Al Gergawi was appointed as Chairman of the Museum of the Future.
Al Gergawi’s career started in 1987, when he joined the United Nations Development Office in Dubai Municipality.
In 1989 he was appointed Deputy Manager for revenue at the finance department.
In 1993, Al Gergawi joined Dubai’s Department of Economic Development as Director of the Department of Finance and Administration.
Al Gergawi led the launch of the Dubai Quality Award in 1994.
